Text:
sorry if this is a lame questions but I'm new to Karaoke. can i just Download this, burn it onto DVD's and throw in the karaoke machine and it will work?
its for my kids so i've never tried getting these types of files.
Anyone want to help out with my original request? I'm helping by seeding at the moment but have yet to be able to use this:(

you have to download a cdg burner and player. there is one here on tpb under 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4419829/karaoke_-_power_gd_g_burner_plus_swift_elite_4-_inc_keygen_and_p 


it takes a minute to figure out the keygen and patches and everything but mine works perfectly now.
OMFG! Thanks you! I haven't been able to find Evanescence anywhere else but here!
great cdg's  btw. if the metal is also yours Ano. We have so much fun with this.!!
